00023 
00024 #include <vle/extension/DifferenceEquation.hpp>
00025 
00026 namespace Crop {
00027 
00028     class CropClimate: public vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple
00029     {
00030     public:
00031         CropClimate(const vle::devs::DynamicsInit& init,
00032               const vle::devs::InitEventList& events) :
00033         vle::extension::DifferenceEquation::Multiple(init, events)
00034         {
00035         // Variables d'etat gerees par ce composant CropClimate
00036         ActionRH = createVar("ActionRH");
00037         ActionTemp = createVar("ActionTemp");
00038 
00039         // Variables  gérées par un autre  composant
00040         RH = createSync("RH"); 
00041         TempMean = createSync("TempMean");
00042 
00043         // Lecture des parametres
00044         M_TempOpt = vle::value::toDouble(events.get("M_TempOpt"));
00045         }
00046 
00047 
00048         virtual ~CropClimate() {};
00049 
00050 
00051             virtual void compute(const vle::devs::Time& /*time*/)
00052         {
00053         //std::cout << "CropClimate compute begin" << std::endl;
00054         ActionTemp = 1 - (0.0022 * pow((TempMean() - M_TempOpt),2));
00055         ActionRH = 0.0;
00056         }
00057 
00058             virtual void initValue(const vle::devs::Time& /* time */)
00059             {
00060         //std::cout << "CropClimate init begin" << std::endl;
00061         ActionTemp = 0.0;
00062         ActionRH = 0.0;
00063         }
00064 
00065 
00066         private:
00067         //Variables d'etat
00068         Var ActionTemp; 
00069         Var ActionRH; 
00071         //Entrées
00072         Sync TempMean;
00073         Sync RH;
00074 
00075         //Parametres du modele
00076         double M_TempOpt; 
00078     };
00079 }
00080 DECLARE_NAMED_DYNAMICS(CropClimate, Crop::CropClimate); // balise specifique VLE
